song_lyrics: Vandan karīe karoḍo karoḍo, Swāmī charaṇomā,
Namaskār karīe karoḍo, Pramukh Swāmī charaṇomā...
Bhavthī amne ugārvāne, āpe dharyo avatār,
Shat shat jīvjo, sharad he Swāmī, sahunā chho ādhār,
Ātamnā am dīp jalāvī, vasjo antarmāy, ho Swāmī.
Pramukh Swāmījī ruṇ āpnu, agaṇit aparampār,
Prāṇ amārā pātharīe toye, tole nā’ve lagār,
Tav rājīpo samp suhradbhāv, sevā samjaṇmāy.
Araj amārī suṇajo he Swāmī, karjo Aksharrup,
Nirdosh buddhi bhakti dejo, sahuno mahimā anūp,
Ant same am hāth grahīne, lejo Aksharmāy, ho Swāmī.
title: Vandan karīe karoḍo karoḍo Swāmī charaṇomā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3023: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
